verses.text:
Trust-ing in the Lord my God, Trust-ing in His ho-ly Word,
Trust-ing in re-deem-ing grace, Trust-ing in His love al-ways.

Trust-ing when the way seems long, Trust-ing when I can-not see,
Trust-ing Je-sus all the way, Trust-ing Him from day to day.

Trust-ing in the blood that saves, Trust-ing in the power that heals,
Trust-ing in the love that keeps, Trust-ing in the grace that seals.
